Reviews.Content: please pay attention reviewers hotel receptionist ahmed totally minus truly hotel hostel information written completely true traveled friends according information received phone call family bed single beds picked worker murat acting friendly fake hotel met friendly receptionist ahmed sudden transferred hotel ast hotel building furniture arrived 1 morning agreed move tired sleep location hotel walk building located near vile building ready occupied internet connection floor dirty sands tv breakfast view horrible minus king bed size single bed suggest sleep pig pay argued porter polite disrespect guests solve night decided money hotel offered add night disagree told move lunch time money suddenly information stay main hotel lunch time 1000 morning porter knocked guests prove lack service hospitality argued left hotel 1200 agreed met ahmed smile hospitality welcomed nice toilet horrible water view horrible sea view mentioned information breakfast bread jams coffee tea night manager hotel talked friend tone front guest lobby complained trouble wow totally blind hotel pigs cage dirty smell awful argued disrespectful insisted hotel disagreed wont return money shortly dont recommend hotel enjoy wasting energy arguing stupid porter manager welcome time checking morning 0500 guests sleeping couch believe experienced yes ahmed nice guy pure heart help people yes dont airport shuttle hotel agency near hotel hotel charge 20 euro agency charge 5 euro enjoy trip

Reviews.Title: “Ast hotel - great bargain”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: hotel undergoing renovation moment look simply fabulous month shabby renovated price bargain offseason management exceptionally helpful courteous accommodating included breakfast simple limited europeanstyle consisting coffee water sliced baguette butter jam breakfasts found hotels stayed

Reviews.Title: “Brilliant”
Reviews.Author: kama342
Reviews.Content: friend stayed hotel week magnificent stay excellent turks hospitality neorion hotel family feel special hotel beautifully decorated standard sauna department downstairs ideally situated city sights walking distance breakfast tasteful nicely untill 11 am dont hurry mornings feel holidays third visit istanbul neorion definately coming staying brilliant hotel

Reviews.Title: “very nice place”

Reviews.Content: nights staff helpful hotel nice clean 24 hot tea coffee ready day 5 time turkish hotel near sultan ahmet nice stay recepionist ahmet helpfull hotel

Reviews.Title: “worst experience ever”

Reviews.Content: reserved hotel thru internet besides getting view onto airconditioners outside ran noice depending guests breakfast lousy furthermore tried days receipt payment success night departure manager told internet agency giving prepayment price excluded tax 18 willing pay 18 receipt sum cash payed altogether insisted throw hotel needless insist proper receipt spent restless night search evening

Reviews.Title: “you book and pay online and u go there they say we're full.. ((stay away))”
Reviews.Author: alrobaish
Reviews.Content: thats happened swiss person met booked paid online hotel dirty hotel fridge air conditioning charge price cant paid manager bad attitude simply

Reviews.Title: “Familiar, warm atmosphere, amazing price. Wonderfull surprise”
Reviews.Author: SwankMadrid
Reviews.Content: manager friendly makes stay comfortable located local neighbourhood allows touch people meet turistic location takes 10 minutes walking sultanahmet visit sta blue railway station located acceptable price pay air conditioner plasma tv lots channels fridge views amazing watch nightfall taking free tea pleasure istanbul book

Reviews.Title: “Quite and Warm atmosphere”
Reviews.Author: SarthakSam
Reviews.Content: horrible stay night fatima sultan hotel stepped search hotel season walked ast hotel greeted elder brother ahmed name believe brothers own hotel confirmed emptying hotel near ayasofia ayasofia 10 mins walk backstreet major tourist attractions 5 mins walk marmara sea clean double 5 hotels stayted trip istanbul comfortable bathroom hot water quick shower refreshed ahmed offered teacoffee kept lobby guests help themselves whenever free breakfast served restaurant groundfloor carry hisher plate terrace lovely view marmara sea stayed night loved brother owners drove airport recommend hotel stay crowd walking distance

Reviews.Title: “a nice place for nice people”
Reviews.Author: poursayah
Reviews.Content: everytime istanbul remember hotel city polite helpful staff wife week everymorning breakfast roof beautiful view marmara sea historical building blue mosque palace near disadvantage water bath unstable air hotel clean silent hotel near istanbul

Reviews.Title: “Very very noisy”
Reviews.Author: Eleanore42
Reviews.Content: hotel nice road loud awake night hotel pokey bathroom door didnt close didnt fit door hair dryer didnt hear word spoken door smell gas whenever window stone marble stair night day theres sound footsteps banging stairs door reception stair night sleep interrupted sounds people arriving reception chatting staff nice tried fix bathroom electrics hairdryer didnt prove didnt attempt provide alternative definitely recommend hotel transfered hotel booked close financial reasons noisy electrics terrible bathroom facilities cramped shower rest bathroom flooded sparse worse bathroom door wouldnt close definitely money wish

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value, wonderfully welcoming people”
Reviews.Author: grayda
Reviews.Content: spent excellent week ast hotel dont understand negative reviews writing entirely nice excellent location brothers run wonderfully friendly slight hitch spite confirmed booking arranged spend nights hotel close brought nice finally ast
